title: lagging on windows 10
body: i recently upgraded my os from 32bit windows 7 to 64bit windows 10. my computer should be geared up to handle it, but every time a fight starts i'll lag. my fps was always 30, now it hits 180ish, but when i cap i still get the lag spikes. any ideas? i'm getting annoyed that in the first couple seconds of a team fight i'll be useless and probably cost my team the game.

replies.body:
One of the first things I'd recommend doing after any system changes is to make sure all your drivers are up to date.  As a first step, go ahead and check out our [FPS Troubleshooting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684) article which goes over the most common causes of FPS drops.  If it doesn't fix it, it'll at least give us a better idea of what's going on.

Lemme know if it helps!
